detail_desc: Short jacket in corduroy with metal buttons. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid that is impressive even at low temperatures. As an added bonus it will help to retain the colour of your clothes. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Trainers in patterned scuba fabric with a padded top edge, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Round sunglasses with narrow metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on one sleeve and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Kids Exclusive. Leggings in a soft, rib-knit organic cotton blend. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sports bag in woven fabric with two wide handles at the top. Drawstring at the top and two shoulder straps which mean the bag can be carried as a backpack. Large outer compartment with a press-stud and a small inner compartment. Double-layered. Width 39 cm. Height 45 cm.
Satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Long sleeves with two covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
Metal bangles in different designs
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Short cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and hem.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with leaf-shaped pendants in different sizes. Length 7 cm.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Boots in patterned imitation patent leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Elastic bracelets in various designs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, and side pockets. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim. Straps with adjustable press-stud fasteners at the top, and press-studs at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 6-12M. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and elasticated hems.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave made from recycled polyester with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Small handbag with a zip and short, adjustable shoulder strap at the top, and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 14.5 cm. Width 24.5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour panels around the sleeves and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in textured-knit premium cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood, at the cuffs and hem.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps with decorative straps front and back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.

A-line dress in airy, patterned viscose twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one with an all-over print. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Leather mules with covered heels, square toes and a narrow foot strap. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 10 cm.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.5 cm.
Short blouse in crinkled chiffon with a shimmering pattern, flounced wrapover front, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Jersey lining.

Foldaway backpack in woven fabric with a zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps with plastic fasteners. One zipped inner compartment and a zipped outer compartment into which the backpack can be easily folded and enclosed. Practical carry strap when the backpack is folded away. Size 14.5x30x46 cm. Size when folded 3x16.5x22.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in weighty stretch viscose and linen twill. Regular waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a flap and button. Slightly lower crotch and wide, straight-cut legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Short, high-waisted jersey shorts in a cotton and modal blend with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with ribbing around the neckline and short, flounced sleeves with broderie anglaise.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Imitation suede slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and an ankle strap with elastication at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a sewn-on extended hem in woven fabric with fake buttons, and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Sandals in imitation suede with hook and loop fastenings. Imitation suede linings and insoles, and fluted soles.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. The shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck, cut-out section at the sides and back and wide, elasticated crossover straps at the front.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered, ankle-length legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and frills at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with a longer hem. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Two metal pairs and one patterned plastic pair. Diameter from 3 cm to 4.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini top. Triangular cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back. No fasteners.
Sleeveless, fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, both front and back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
